title: Panoptic Insights: October Newsletter
description: Explore Panoptic's latest insights on DeFi options, including recent implied volatility on Uniswap V3, uncertainty in the options markets before U.S. elections, and upcoming platform updates in our October newsletter.

title: Panoptic Solves LVR
description: Panoptic addresses the issue of Loss-Versus-Rebalancing (LVR) for Uniswap LPs by boosting LP returns through LP token lending markets, passive liquidity provision, and the ability to short LP tokens, turning LVR from a risk into a strategic opportunity.

title: Panoptic Insights: September Newsletter
description: Explore Panoptic's latest insights on DeFi options, including Uniswap V3's impact on implied volatility, bullish sentiment heading into Q4, and upcoming platform updates in our September newsletter.

title: From CEX to DEX: A New Formulation For Implied Volatility - Part 2
description: Explore a novel approach to calculating implied volatility (IV) in DeFi by leveraging LP positions in Uniswap v3, offering a new formula that aligns with the LPDfi ecosystem.

title: Panoptic Insights: August Newsletter
description: Highlights from EthCC, insights on decentralization's impact on options trading, strategies like reverse gamma scalping, and market trends, plus upcoming events and media appearances!
